allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Initial commit: Powertec Project Audit Form

- React + Vite application for project audits
- 7 audit sections with 57 items total
- Signature pad for Project Manager sign-off
- PDF generation with jsPDF
- Microsoft authentication via MSAL
- Auto-save to localStorage
- Tailwind CSS styling

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
Bash(powershell -ExecutionPolicy Bypass -Command "Import-Module PowerShellGet; Install-Module -Name Microsoft.Online.SharePoint.PowerShell -Force -AllowClobber -Scope CurrentUser")
